title: Modec bags FEED contract for ExxonMobil’s FPSO in Guyana
dc:creator: Adis Ajdin
description: Japanese floater expert Modec has inked a contract to perform front-end engineering and design (FEED) for a floating production, storage and offloading vessel (FPSO) at ExxonMobil’s Uaru development project in the Stabroek block offshore Guyana. The FEED contract award relates to the initial funding by ExxonMobilâ€™s subsidiary, Esso Exploration and Production Guyana Limited (EEPGL), to …
